title: Introduction to C Programming
description: Learn the basics of C programming language, including data types, variables, and control structures. Develop foundational programming skills through practical exercises.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Understand the fundamental algorithms used in computer science. Explore sorting, searching, and graph algorithms through theoretical lectures and practical implementation.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Learn C++ programming language for Data Structures and Algorithms. Develop a strong foundation in C++ and apply it to solve complex algorithmic problems.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Explore fundamental data structures including arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues. Understand their implementation and usage for efficient data management.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Discover the principles of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) using Python. Learn about classes, objects, inheritance, and polymorphism for efficient code organization.

title: Software Engineering
description: Gain insights into the principles of software development. Learn about software design, testing, and maintenance. Develop skills to manage complex software projects.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: Explore the basics of Amazon Web Services (AWS) and cloud computing. Learn about cloud infrastructure, storage, and computing services provided by AWS.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Learn the fundamentals of MySQL database management. Understand data modeling, querying, and database optimization techniques for efficient data storage and retrieval.

title: Problem-Solving Part.
description: Develop problem-solving skills for complex programming challenges. Learn strategies and techniques to approach and solve various algorithmic problems efficiently.
